## rough work file to understand different behaviours of the comprerssion and decompression

101 direct mapping
000 dictionary index

011 2 bit consecutive mismatches
00010 starting location
001 dictionary index

110 original binary
11111111111111111000000000000000

101 direct mapping
100 dictionary index

010 1 bit mismatch
10000 mismatch location
000 dictionary index

101
011101001101101101000101
01101000000111101000101001101100
10100010101010110110101100000101
11000100100111010101100011010101
01010111010110010111110110010101
01010010001110000011111000001010
00101011101101101110101010101001
10111110111010110010110110100010
10110101010110110101110100010110
01011111011100011101110011001011
01101001101010000011010001010101
01000101001101111101011101010001
10000110100010111010110010100010
10011011001010111010001010101011
11110110010001111101101010111100
11111001000001010110101000

101: 101 direct mapping

100: 01000, 11010, 100
padded 1's: 1111111111111111
xxxx
000 - 00000000000000000000000000000000
001 - 01100000000000000000000000000010
010 - 11111000111111111111001111111111
011 - 11111110000000100000000000001000
100 - 11011111111111111111111111111101
101 - 11101111111111111111111111110111
110 - 00000000011111100000000000011100
111 - 11111000000000000111111111111111

// verifying 4 bits masked comprerssing
[INFO] comprerssing 00000000000000001101000000000000
[INFO] trying => runLengthEncoding
[INFO] trying => directMatch
[INFO] trying => oneBitMismatch
[INFO] trying => twoBitMismatchCon
[INFO] trying => fourBitMasked
[INFO] hamming dist: 3
[INFO] found a place to apply mask: mismatches 3
[INFO] compressed code :001
ML   : 10000
Mask : 1101
Dict : 000 
Mask applied to ML 10000 -> 0000 0000 0000 0000 1101 0000 0000 0000

[INFO] comprerssing 10100000011111100000000000011100
[INFO] trying => runLengthEncoding
[INFO] trying => directMatch
[INFO] trying => oneBitMismatch
[INFO] trying => twoBitMismatchCon
[INFO] trying => fourBitMasked
[INFO] hamming dist: 2
[INFO] found a place to apply mask: mismatches 2
[INFO] compressed code :001
ML   : 00000
Mask : 1010: 
Dict : 110: 00000000011111100000000000011100
Mask applied to ML 00000 -> 10100000011111100000000000011100

**************************************************************
diff> compressed outputs

line 8  : 0 101001, 00011, 100: 11100:00011: 000, 1010
        :   101001, 00011, 100: 11100:00011: 000, 101000
target  : 0 101001, 00011, 100: 00011:11100: 000, 1010


line 19 : 100: 11010:01000: 100 1111111111111111
        : 100: 11010:01000: 100
target  : 100: 01000:11010: 100 1111111111111111

problem identified: order of mismatch locations must be interchanged
